attributes.additional_details: I call on the DWP to have a deadline of 8 weeks for all  mandatory PIP and DlA reconsiderations as the current unlimited timescale is unfair and undemocratic lives are having to be put on hold children with disabilities unable to do their sport because of the lack of haste in sorting the issue by The DWP. I call on Ian Duncan Smith to change this measure as a matter of urgency!
